vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire from James T. Henrise and Glinda Henrise, (1) a fee simple interest of approximately 76,181 square feet of land, and (2) a slope easement of a total of approximately 10, 630 square feet of land located near the intersection of University Hills Boulevard and Wheatland Road for the Wheatland Road Extension Project - Not to exceed $209,600.00 ($206,100.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,500.00) - Financing: 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund
